alert.note: Alert for Imperial (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 5:32PM PDT until August 18 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Imperial County in southeastern California... * Until 600 PM PDT. * At 532 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ocotillo, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plaster City, Ocotillo, Hwy S2 Vallecito Creek Rd, Dixieland, and Coyote Wells. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 5 and 25. CA Route 98 between mile markers 1 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
